responses: Hello and thanks for talking to me
You are welcome, if you have another question, ask away or to leave this chat, just say bye!
I am sorry, I don't understand you
Please ask your question more clearly!
I'm sorry I can't help you any further, if you wish to contact the University Hub, call 0202080903
May I interest you in the events at the University? Check out the Events section in the University website
The address of the University Campus is 12 University Road, AB1 2CD, London
For any queries regarding your Student ID, visit the Student ID section in the University website
To access your timetable, check out this link and log in with your credentials in the Timetable section in the University website
To get in contact with the teaching staff of the university, check out the contact section in the University website
